INTERCEPTOR

A browser extension that mocks AJAX request at the browser level so you can run front ends without really starting a backend server.

Features

With Interceptor, you can modify HTTP responses and see the changes immediatly without requiring a server.

Listen to Incoming Requests

It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.

Read More
